name: TripleZip
headline: Automating CRE accounting with AI
description: TripleZip is a platform that automates accounting for commercial real estate using AI. CRE firms use TripleZip to save up to 95% on accounting compared to hiring an outside firm for complex tasks like CAM reconciliation and budgeting.

founders.name: Grayson Pike, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder of TripleZip, a platform for automating commercial real estate accounting.

Before TripleZip, I was a consultant at McKinsey & Company and a back-end tech lead at the hedge fund ExodusPoint.

University of Texas at Austin class of '21 🤘

founders.name: Yash Sahota, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder of TripleZip, a platform for automating commercial real estate accounting.

Before TripleZip, I was a product security engineer at Slack and a consultant at McKinsey & Company.

Cornell CS '20

generated_description:
**Company Overview: TripleZip**

Founded in 2025 and part of Y Combinator’s W25 Batch, TripleZip is a New York-based startup focused on revolutionizing accounting for commercial real estate (CRE) through the power of AI. The company's mission is clear: **Automating CRE accounting with AI**. 

**What Does TripleZip Do?**

TripleZip provides a sleek SaaS platform that offers substantial cost savings—up to 95%—over traditional accounting firms, especially for complex tasks like Common Area Maintenance (CAM) reconciliation and budgeting. The automation capabilities of their platform enable CRE firms to manage their finances with much greater efficiency, executing processes up to ten times faster than before.

Here are some of the standout features:

- **Intelligent Budgeting & Forecasting**: The platform analyzes historical data to highlight trends in property expenses, allowing users to create budgets and forecasts with a level of insights that was previously time-prohibitive.
- **Effortless CAM Reconciliation**: With AI-driven reviews, users can complete CAM reconciliations in mere minutes, mitigating costly errors.
- **Accurate Lease Abstraction**: TripleZip accelerates lease abstracting, automatically incorporating the latest amendments, ensuring everything is current and reducing manual data entry risks.

**The Team Behind TripleZip**

Despite its small team of two, TripleZip’s impact is profound. With Harj Taggar as a Group Partner, the ethos is clearly about agility and innovation. The company's small size fosters a nimble environment, enabling rapid development and responsive adjustments to client needs.

**Why It Matters**

Commercial real estate has long been bogged down by cumbersome and traditional accounting practices. By integrating AI into this space, TripleZip not only streamlines operations but also helps firms focus on what truly matters: managing their properties effectively. It empowers lean teams to oversee larger portfolios and makes financial insights more accessible and actionable.

Whether you're in need of detailed forecasting or quick lease management, TripleZip positions itself as a critical partner in the CRE landscape, making the future of property accounting not just automated but intelligently insightful.

For more detailed insights, you can visit their website at [TripleZip.ai](https://www.triplezip.ai/).
